wisheshayenma kotingen bidi giya kotas ha koti wirodhi kotas anuka්ramayen apa ha sambandha wannata wiya" yanuweni.‘patisothagamiwa this wasak’ kruthiye thawath ek parichchedayaka ohu sandahan karanne thaman aar.premadasa mahathawa balayen iwath kirimata mahath kapakirimak kala bawath, ethumage maranaya salawimath samangama thamage hithata sathutak athiwu bawath, eheth aar.premadasa mahatha wani nir-prabhu charithayak pilibandawa ese katayuthu kirima pilibandawa thaman ada dinayedi (2010di) kanagatuwana bawathya.aar.premadasa sadhakayedi menma, thamange balalobhaya nisa 2015 di thama ratata athkala iranama pilibandawa thamange marana manchakayedi ho champakata kanagatu wimata siduwanu niyathaya.emenma 2000-2005 kalayedi "sinhalaye ranahanda" lesa handinwu champakayan, ada dinayedi narin da, kotin da, otuwan da, rathu alin da, kaha balallu da samangin ekama wedikawaka "balu sinhayeku" se laga sitima pilibandawa sithata athi wana mahath wu pahan sanwegaya nisama awasana washayen melesa sandahan karannemi.

pereda (20da) sawasa 4.30ta pamana ghathanayata lakwa athi mawa ha sakakara wadimahal putha athara niwese prashnayak pananangi athi athara pasuwa sakakaru mawa pasupasa pannagena gos niwesa idiripitadi ohu bhawitha karanu labana the gas kapana pihiyen mawage hisehi kondaya kapa urahisata ha bellatada kota atha.

ithama awankawa pawasanne nam ma melesa aya samanga munupothe chat ekakata set wennema aya kerehi hatagath yam aalayak nisamaya.eya nahayi kiya pawasimata ma kisilesakath uthsaha karanne natha.thawada ema aalaya hatagaththe kawara thanakinda kiya nishchithawa pawasimata mata nohakiya.muladi age kawibasa gana arambai ee sanwadaya krama kramayen kalanurupiwa mata awasi mawatha wetha yomu karaganimata mata hakiyawak thibini.eya age paththen baluwoth yam wanka kriyawak lesa keneku pawasimata ida atha.namuth ma eya prathikshepa karami.maknisada yath aya kerehi hatagath aalawantha bawa wyajayak nowana bawa mata indurama wishwasa bawini.namuth meya munupothe chat ekak haraha ayata sruju lesa pawasimata mata dahiriyak athath mata eya etharam gochara deyak nowe.ebawin mage uthsahaya wuye dineka ayawa munagasi ayata me bawa pawasimataya.
namuth ee kathawata wadiyenma hina giye mata.
"owun numbaata itha prayojanawath boho dewal di thibenawa."
hiruge mema kriyawa thulin, tharika wenaskam da eeta anurupa wa manawa awatharawala wenaskam da wi atha.
